alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Major; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 2:27AM CDT until August 06 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Northern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ingersoll, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Alva, Cherokee, Medford, Helena, Pond Creek, Garber, Lahoma, Lamont, Carmen, Wakita, Kremlin, Goltry, Breckenridge, Jet, Aline, Nash, Hunter, Burlington, and Fairmont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
